title: Adaptive radiation: the mollusks
creator_credit: John Walker and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: Illustrates the principles of adaptive radiation and shows how the typical molluscan characteristics are modified in each of the six classes. Suitable for upper secondary level.
